title: Tempted by Deception
description: My husband. My villain.We started with death and blood.We started with games and carnal pleasure.Adrian and I shouldn’t have been together.He’s wrong. I’m wrong.What we have is the epitome disaster.Yet, it’s impossible to stop.My husband will either destroy me or I’ll destroy him.This book is part of a trilogy and is not standalone.NOTE: This is the special edition print of the book Tempted by Deception. To find the ebook and audiobook, please look for the main edition.
author: Rina Kent
